titleproper.value:
Guide to the Confederate States of America Collection 
                    <lb/> 1860-1896 (bulk 1861-1865) 
                    <lb/>
                    <num>MS670.7</num>

author.value: Finding aid prepared by Susan Kriete

creation.value:
This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit
                <date>2014-04-16T11:24-0400</date>

abstract.label: Abstract
abstract.value:
This collection is comprised of records and correspondence relating to the Confederacy and Confederate army. The materials in this collection have been digitized and are available online to on-site researchers and to users affiliated with subscribing institutions via 
                <extref ns2:href="http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&db=h5c&bquery=(HJ+FBDB)+OR+(HJ+FBDD)+OR+(HJ+FBDH)+OR+(HJ+FBDJ)+OR+(HJ+FBDK)+OR+(HJ+FBDN)+OR+(HJ+FBDR)&type=1&site=ehost-live">EBSCOhost</extref>.

p.value: Items that include presidential signatures will be presented to researchers in duplicate form.

Series III, Confederate forms, consists of blank copies of official forms used by the Confederate government and army, including conscription forms, requests for exemption, and requisition and receipt forms.
